Text: This was on 11 March 2012 -- description was copy & paste from part 1 and i forgot to change the date.

Thanks...iamgreat, only 1 or 2 uploaders give us Heartland.  Will you please u/l this on a regular basis?  I have been waiting since Sunday for SOMEONE to u/l the latest episode.  Like everyone else...I think your work is GREAT!  Thank you!
